subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin, the 2004 Olympic champion at 100 meters who returned to competition last year after serving a four-year doping ban, arrived at the world championships in Daegu, South Korea, with frostbite on both feet.
snippet: Justin Gatlin, the 2004 Olympic champion at 100 meters who returned to competition last year after serving a four-year doping ban, arrived at the world championships in Daegu, South Korea, with frostbite on both feet.
